DOC.brief_summary: This project develop evaluate Internet-based interactive program digital coaching design assist two group smoker quit smoking : ( 1 ) pregnant smoker ( 2 ) general-population smoker ( i.e. , men non-pregnant woman ) . Program content base U.S. Department Health Human Services Clinical Practice Guidelines , `` Treating Tobacco Use Dependence : 2008 Update '' ( Fiore et al. , 2008 ) input project consultant .
DOC.detailed_description: The `` Break Chain '' program online smoke cessation intervention incorporate strategic message construction base behavior change construct , interactive exercise , digitial coach support engage user smoking behavior change . The Expanded Theory Reasoned Action ( ETRA ) ( Fishbein , 1999 , 2000 ) provide theoretical foundation content . Intervention component include : ( 1 ) interactive check-in , ( 2 ) content module interactive smoke cessation tool , ( 3 ) digital coaching , ( 4 ) online social medium ( i.e. , article feed ) . Content module include : Benefits quit , Making plan quit , Boosting support system , Planning craving tempt situation , Managing stress mood , Managing weight , Becoming ex-smoker . Tailored information within module present user base response initial assessment question interactive check-in ( e.g. , readiness quit , pregnancy status , previous quit attempt , self-efficacy quitting , worry weight gain ) . Interactive tool present within logical flow module include Reasons Quitting questionnaire , Pros Cons Quitting tool ( decisional balance ) , Nicotine Dependence quiz , Pharmacological Aid Decision tool , Quit Meter . Content entirely text-based . Within-program coach-generated program-generated message provide cessation tip information . Digital coach contact time tailor user 's smoking status , health history , pregnancy status ( appropriate ) , time quit day . The coaching message prompt user engage fully website present hyperlink pertinent smoke cessation information strategy program . A computer algorithm control timing message user . Users invite contact coach via in-program message time question concern smoke cessation strategy . A coach interface allow health coach view user information user progress program develop his/her quit plan . The coach interface also platform coach manage communication user .
